data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Saint George.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint George, Antigua and Barbuda
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Saint George, Antigua and Barbuda by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,208 believers in Saint George, Antigua and Barbuda desire the Bible as newborn babies desire milk.
data.verse: Desire God’s pure word as newborn babies desire milk. Then you will grow in your salvation.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 2,208 believers find a person of peace today among the 6,692 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Saint George.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Saint George.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Saint George.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
